ext_descriptions.ext_description:
An organization_type is a recognized kind of organization.
A national standards body is a type of organization.
the string of characters that identify the organization_type.
the word or words by which the organization_type is known.
the word or words that characterize the organization_type.
An organization_type_relationship relates two instances of the organization_type entity data type and provides for the identification, naming, and description of that relationship.
the word or words that characterize the organization_type_relationship.
the string of characters that identify the organization_type_relationship.
the word or words by which the organization_type_relationship is known.

related_organization_type: the other instance of organization_type that is a part of the relationship. If one element of the relationship is dependent upon the other, attribute shall be the dependent one.
The meaning of this attribute can be defined in the annotated EXPRESS schemas that use or specialize this entity, or in an agreement of common understanding between the partners sharing this information.

one of the instances of organization_type that is a part of the relationship.
The meaning of this attribute can be defined in the annotated EXPRESS schemas that use or specialize this entity, or in an agreement of common understanding between the partners sharing this information.

A person_type_definition is a characterization of type of person.
A driver could be defined as someone who holds a valid driving licence.
the string of characters that identify the person_type_definition.
the word or words by which the person_type_definition is known.
the word or words that characterize the person_type_definition.
the person_type_definition_formation to which the person_type_definition relates.

A person_type_definition_formation is a collector of definitions of a type of person.
A driver could be defined as someone who holds a valid driving licence or as someone who is employed as a driver.
the string of characters that identify the person_type_definition_formation.
the word or words by which the person_type_definition_formation is known
the word or words that characterize the person_type_definition_formation.
the person_type to which the person_type_definition_formation belongs.
A person_type_definition_relationship relates two instances of the person_type_definition entity data type and provides for the identification, naming, and description of that relationship.
the string of characters that identify the person_type_definition_relationship.
the word or words by which the person_type_definition_relationship is known.
the word or words that characterize the person_type_definition_relationship.

the other instance of person_type_definition that is a part of the relationship. If one element of the relationship is dependent upon the other, attribute shall be the dependent one.
The meaning of this attribute can be defined in the annotated EXPRESS schemas that use or specialize this entity, or in an agreement of common understanding between the partners sharing this information.

one of the instances of person_type_definition that is a part of the relationship.
The meaning of this attribute can be defined in the annotated EXPRESS schemas that use or specialize this entity, or in an agreement of common understanding between the partners sharing this information.

A position_in_organization is a specific function or job performed by a person in a particular organization. It is defined by responsibilities and activities. A position that is not fulfilled by a person is a vacancy.
The chairperson of SC4.
the string of characters that identify the position_in_organization.
the word or words by which the position_in_organization is known.
the word or words that characterize the position_in_organization.

A position_in_organization_type is a generic function or job that is performed in organizations.
Company director.
the string of characters that identify the position_in_organization.
the word or words by which the position_in_organization is known.
the word or words that characterize the position_in_organization.
A position_in_organization_relationship relates two instances of the position_in_organization entity data type and provides for the identification, naming, and description of that relationship.
the string of characters that identify the position_in_organization_relationship.
the word or words by which the position_in_organization_relationship is known.
the word or words that characterize the position_in_organization_relationship.

the other instance of position_in_organization that is a part of the relationship. If one element of the relationship is dependent upon the other, attribute shall be the dependent one.
The meaning of this attribute can be defined in the annotated EXPRESS schemas that use or specialize this entity, or in an agreement of common understanding between the partners sharing this information.

one of the instances of position_in_organization that is a part of the relationship.
The meaning of this attribute can be defined in the annotated EXPRESS schemas that use or specialize this entity, or in an agreement of common understanding between the partners sharing this information.
